author: jaz
msg: implemented per-site "protect" settings. Instead of only per request or per instance (setting in security.properties), now we support per application with a new <protect view="name_of_view"/> element in controller.xml. If the "protect" response is not found, first it will check for a applicaiton default before falling back to per instance.

author: byron
msg: VELOCITY-644 Reversed the changes back to pre 644, t.image cannot be set to null without affecting literal
